resources.string:
The BITalino acquisition client must send a JSON string format (cite Gj√∏by) as follow:
 At first, a client must send a metadata to identify it self.
 A metadata is formatted as below:

 {"type": "meta",
	"name": Name of source,
	"id": Source ID,

	"channels": [
		 {"id": ID,
			"type": TYPE,
			"metric": METRIC,
			"description":DESCRIPTION}, 
		 {"id": ID,
			"type": TYPE,
			"metric": METRIC,
			"description":DESCRIPTION},
		.....]
}

 Then, the client sends data samples that are formatted as below:

 { "type": "data",
	"id": ID_SOURCE,
	"time": COLLECT_AT,

	"data":[
		{"id": CHANNEL_ID, "value":VALUE},
		{"id": CHANNEL_ID, "value":VALUE},
		...]
}
